Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: All moves will deal chip damage on block
Comment: Cannot K.O. with chip damage, chip damage turns into recoverable health gauge

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: A Heat Dash can be used when a Heat Engager hits or is blocked (after activation, Heat will end)
Comment: Until Heat Engager reaches the opponent {f-hold} (or {HBHS}), additional chip damage on block

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: Heat Smash, a move that causes critical damage, can be activated (after activation, Heat will end)
Comment: During Heat {HBHS} (or {2+3})

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: A new Ducking In shift move can be used

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Comment: During Ducking In {1+3} (or {2+4}), etc.

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Can parry mid attacks during Lion Heart
Comment: During Lion Heat, take mid attack from opponent

Name: Heat Burst
Comment: Partially uses remaining Heat time, {2+3,b,b} to cancel attack

Name: Rocket Launcher
Comment: {d,df,f,1,b-hold} shift to Flicker Stance (does not shift when using Heat Dash)

Name: Eraser
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Two-Faced
Description: With Heat activated during Lion Heart, take mid attack from opponent
Comment: Shift to Two-Faced

Name: Ducking In Direct
Comment: Shift to Ducking In, partially uses remaining Heat time, hold {3} (or {4}) {b-hold} to shift to Swaying, {u} (or {d}) to shift to Ducking Left / Right, {db-hold} to cancel

Name: Two-Faced
Comment: Cannot throw escape

Name: Dominion Rush
Comment: Throw escape {1}, partially uses remaining Heat time

Name: Debutante Ball
Comment: Throw escape {2}, partially uses remaining Heat time

Name: Bretwalda
Comment: Heat Smash, on hit shift to throw, on block shift to Lion Heat (does not shift with {b-hold})

Name: Bretwalda
Comment: Or during Heat and Flicker Stance {2+3}, Heat Smash, on hit shift to throw, on block shift to Lion Heat (does not shift with {b-hold})

Name: Dear Land of Hope
Comment: Rage Art, erases opponent's recoverable health on hit

Name: Double Jab
Comment: Can shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying

Name: Jab > Body Blow
Comment: {1,d,1,b-hold} to shift to Flicker Stance

Name: Lightning Combo
Comment: Can shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying

Name: Double Jab > Body Blow
Comment: {1,1,d,1,b-hold} to shift to Flicker Stance

Name: Left Right
Comment: Can shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying

Name: British Edge Combo
Comment: Can shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying from second to fourth hits, {1,2,1,f-hold} to shift to Peakaboo {1,2,1,b-hold} to shift to Flicker Stance

Name: Vanguard Rush
Comment: {2,1,f-hold} to shift to Peakaboo, {2,1,b-hold} to shift to Flicker Stance

Name: Ducking Left
Comment: Shift to Ducking Left, hold {3} {b-hold} to shift to Swaying, {f-hold} to shift to Ducking, {d-hold} to shift to Ducking Right

Name: Ducking Right
Comment: Shift to Ducking Right, hold {4} {b-hold} to shift to Swaying, {f-hold} to shift to Ducking, {d-hold} to shift to Ducking Left

Name: Sonic Fang
Comment: Or while rising {1+2}

Name: Quick Spin
Comment: Shift to Quick Spin

Name: Ducking Body Blow > Left Hook
Comment: {f,2,1,f-hold} to shift to Peakaboo, {f,2,1,b-hold} to shift to Flicker Stance

Name: Conqueror Combination
Comment: {f,2,2} to shift to Lion Heat (does not shift with {b-hold})

Name: Ducking
Comment: Shift to Ducking, hold {3} (or {4}) {b-hold} to shift to Swaying, {u} (or {d}) to shift to Ducking Left / Right, {db-hold} to cancel

Name: Peakaboo
Comment: Shift to Peakaboo, can shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying, {3+4} to shift to Quick Spin

Name: Left Uppercut
Comment: Can shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying

Name: Uppercut Cross Combo
Comment: Can cancel second hit and shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying

Name: Uppercut Psyche-out Hook

Name: Uppercut Psyche-out Left Right Combo
Comment: Can shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying

Name: Crescent Hook
Comment: Can shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying

Name: Wildman Combo
Comment: Can cancel second hit and shift to Ducking, Ducking Left / Right, or Swaying

Name: Knee Clipper
Comment: Or while crouching {db,2}

Name: Foot Stomp Right Hook
Comment: Shift to Lion Heat ({b-hold} to stay in place)

Name: Stun Gun
Comment: Absorb an attack to power up and deal more chip damage on block

Name: Quick Hook
Comment: {b,1,b-hold} to shift to Flicker Stance

Name: Quick Draw
Comment: Shift to Lion Heat ({b-hold} to stay in place)

Name: Frigate Combo
Comment: {b,1,d,2,f-hold} to shift to Peakaboo

Name: Swaying
Comment: Shift to Swaying, hold {3} (or {4}) {f-hold} to shift to Ducking, {u} (or {d}) to shift to Ducking Left / Right

Name: Flicker Stance

Name: Bounty Hunter
Comment: Shift to Lion Heat ({b-hold} to stay in place)

Name: Burst Hammer

Name: Jumping Duck Kick

Comment: {d,df,f,1,b-hold} shift to Flicker Stance (does not shift when using Heat Dash)

Name: Low Cross Blaster

Comment: Shift to Ducking Right, hold {4} {b-hold} to shift to Swaying, {f-hold} to shift to Ducking, {u-hold} to shift to Ducking Left

Comment: Shift to Ducking, hold {3} (or {4}) {b} to shift to Swaying, {u-hold} (or {d-hold}) to shift to Ducking Left / Right, {db-hold} to cancel
